programme.title: With Love, Your Sweetly Salted
programme.desc: Critic Alison goes undercover at a restaurant she slated, but ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: A Holiday Homecoming
programme.desc: The residents of Hope, NY come to the aid of displaced foster children after St. Jerome's Home for Children has a fire right before Christmas, and many families find the foster children complete their homes.

programme.title: A Mile In His Shoes
programme.desc: Baseball coach Murph needs a miracle to save the team. Pitcher Micky with Aspergers may be the answer.

programme.title: A Father's Choice
programme.desc: An unforgettable story about the promise and the power of family.

programme.title: Saving Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: An archaeology professor travels to Scotland in search of an ancient shrine but finds more than she bargained for when a handsome Whiskey brewer offers to be her tour guide.

programme.title: Be Mine
programme.desc: A woman finds romance as she prepares to take over her mother's garden store.

programme.title: A Royal In Paradise
programme.desc: A successful romance writer and a Prince individually escape to a tropical island only to find each otherand true love.

programme.title: You, Me, and that Mountain Retreat
programme.desc: Partnered with nature-hating Nathan, Rebecca is put to the test during a work mountain retreat.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: What We Do For Love
programme.desc: Sophie secures a job at the famous wellness firm but soon clashes with the chief life coach Jason.

programme.title: Vote One For Love
programme.desc: Candace is unexpectedly tasked with helping her former high school rival win a mayoral race.

programme.title: The Bouquet
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters set aside their differences to help their mother save her floral business.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: American vlogger lands role in British 'Pride and Prejudice' film, faces challenge mastering the accent.

programme.title: Deck The Heart

programme.title: A Reason To Live, A Reason To Die
programme.desc: A dishonored army officer saves the lives of some hardened criminals on condition that they help him regain his honor.

programme.title: Day of the Cobra
programme.desc: A corrupt narcotics bureau official hires an ex-cop to find a heroin kingpin on the back streets of Genoa, Italy.

programme.title: Iron Finger
programme.desc: Tough cop Bruce Li arrives back in town in time to investigate a series of odd murders. Victims have two pierce marks on their necks. The killer is an expert in the Iron Finger strike. The fights are fantastic with the two Bruce's and Ku Feng going at it and all are excellent.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Willie Parker has betrayed his former 'colleagues' and now lives in Spain, where he thinks he can hide from their vengeance. But one day, ten years later, two hitmen show up and he must face the music.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.
